column3: str
Debroye is in a state of despair.
Deliver pinches of ascorbic additive to Debroye.
Oh, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>...
I've been trying and trying to make that ascorbic acid.
I've done exactly as Jalvaaz instructed, followed his steps to the letter, but it all ends in failure.
As embarrassing as it is to admit, I simply lack the expertise─the process requires a far more competent hand than mine.
So, here I am at the last, asking for your help once more...
Please, I need you to manufacture the additive that will perfect our perfect meal!
The Studium Deliveries list for Debroye has been updated. To view the new list, speak with Debroye.
All our Mervynbread needs is a viable ascorbic additive. I may have failed in that endeavor, but I have faith that you will succeed!

Ascorbic acid created from plain old coconut milk... I understand the idea in practice, but as you saw, the process itself was beyond my abilities. Thank you, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>.
Incredible─it's practically glowing with goodness! With this added to our creation, I have every confidence that the bread will pass any test they care to subject it to!
With your additive, well, added to the mix, I put a batch of Mervynbread into the oven to bake. It should be ready any moment now!
This is it─the final, fluffy result of much trial and error.
What will you say?
It looks delicious!
It looks so...familiar.
Well, have a bite!
And? How does it taste?
What will you say?
As amazing as it looks!
Like streams of flavor, blending into a single river of ambrosial delight!
Wonderful! And the texture...?
What will you say?
It's like biting into a soft-baked cloud!
It's like natural law has been suspended to create this one moment of unparalleled, puffy-crusted bliss!
Fantastic! And last but not least, what did you think of the aroma?
What will you say?
That luscious, savory smell is to die for!
It's like a siren scent of savory temptation which no mortal stomach can resist!
Exactly what I thought! All the disparate elements have come together so well...
Flavor, texture, aroma─not to mention a perfect balance of nutrients.
And I have you to thank for this delectable achievement!

Yes, I believe this current incarnation of Mervynbread has a good chance of swaying the Forum in our favor. You <Emphasis>are</Emphasis> attending the evaluation, aren't you? In fact, I must insist upon it!
Debroye is thrilled with your efforts. She now considers you a <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Consummate Baker<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>!
The next request will be available from Debroye upon reaching level 90 as an alchemist or culinarian.
